p: The compilation of mosquito inventories is summarized in Table 1. A detailed checklist is shown in Table 2, with the nine ubiquitous species highlighted in grey. Some species complexes (i.e., Aedes cinereus/ geminus, Anopheles maculipennis complex, and Culex pipiens complex) were not identified at the species and/or biotype level. In these cases, the species denomination was annotated with an asterisk.
